version_description:
- Issue occurring in iOS 9 has been fixed
- Fixed many other problems reported by customers.

- Issue occurring in iOS 9 has been fixed

- Meet the new Polaris Office!
: Usability function improved to better manage your documents
- Usability support for Dropbox, OneDrive and other various Clouds.
- Other reported bugs and errors has been fixed

- Meet the new Polaris Office!
: Usability function improved to better manage your documents
- Usability support for Dropbox, OneDrive and other various Clouds.
- Other reported bugs and errors has been fixed

- Additional support for PPS, PPSX format.
- Wordbook find function added for convenience in search option.
- Memorizes the location of last edited cell when switching between sheets.
- Find function error in PDF fixed.
- Other customer inquiry issues has been fixed.

- Additional support for PPS, PPSX format.
- Wordbook find function added for convenience in search option.
- Memorizes the location of last edited cell when switching between sheets.

- Other customer inquiry issues has been fixed.

- You can annotate important notes on PDF as easily as writing them on a paper.
- Improved TEXT type documents to view and edit conveniently.

- We are offering 30 % discount promotion from April 28th to May 6th for the upcoming Labor Day. Enjoy Polaris Office 2017 at a reasonable price!
- Polaris Office 2016 is starting over again with Polaris Office 2017.
- Improved dictation function in the document editor.
- View mode has been improved for users to view documents more conveniently.
- Fixed other bugs.

- We are offering 30 % discount promotion from April 28th to May 6th for the upcoming Labor Day. Enjoy Polaris Office 2017 at a reasonable price!

- Fixed the issue that the arrow keys of Apple Smart Keyboard doesn't work when scrolling in full screen view mode.
- You can move pages by using 'cmd + shift + an arrow key' of Apple Smart Keyboard in Slide and PDF document.
- Fixed other issues that we found from customer reviews and inquiries.

- Fixed the issue that the arrow keys of Apple Smart Keyboard doesn't work when scrolling in full screen view mode.

- Fixed other issues that we found from customer reviews and inquiries.

- Fixed the error that the app is closed when opening some PDF files.
- Fixed the error that the app is intermittently closed when saving a Sheet file.
- Fixed the typing error during multitasking.
- Fixed the error that the icon is occasionally not exposed.
- Fixed the errors of template and aligning recent documents on iPad Pro 9.7.
- Fixed the file transfer error on iPhone.
- Fixed other issues that we found from customer reviews and inquiries.

- Polaris Office 2017 starts anew as Polaris Office 2018.
- iPhone X is now supported. You can view and edit documents on iPhone X for free.
- Improved the performance for viewing and editing documents.
- Fixed the occasional error which is occurred when saving a Sheet document.
- Fixed the error that the text copied in a document is not pasted on SNS or a text message.
- Fixed other issues that we found from customer reviews and inquiries.

- Polaris Office 2017 starts anew as Polaris Office 2018.

- Fixed the error that keyboard input is slowing down when setting shortcut key.
- Fixed the error that original filter is removed when applying the filter to a new column.

In this version,

Polaris Office regards customers feedback as important!

Polaris Office 2018 is newly upgraded to Polaris Office 2019.

Polaris Office 2019 is,
- Provide more fast speed and improved stability by updating to the newest engine.
- Changed UI for using more conveniently.
- Added various new functions for editing and managing documents more conveniently.

[New functions]
- Support Split Window (Split view) mode.
- Added FTP as supported clouds.
- Support App lock function.
- Customers can add their document form as template.

Polaris Office 2018 is newly upgraded to Polaris Office 2019.

Polaris Office 2019 is,
- Provide more fast speed and improved stability by updating to the newest engine.
- Changed UI for using more conveniently.
- Added various new functions for editing and managing documents more conveniently.

[New functions]
- Support Split Window (Split view) mode.
- Added FTP as supported clouds.
- Support App lock function.
- Customers can add their document form as template.

[Polaris Office 2019 major changed function]
- Old files in the Inbox are moved to the Inbox_old folder.
- When saving a document in Inbox, it is synchronized with iTunes for using more conveniently.

In this version,
- Fixed the issue that a document from external app (Safari, File) is not opened.
- Fixed the issue that a document is not showing when connecting to WebDav.
- Added encoding for texts not to be broken when connecting to FTP.
- Improved the movement that a Sheet document goes to the last worked location when saving and reopening the document.
- Improved Image file insert movement. (Able to insert directly after taking a picture.)
- Added new templates for Polaris slide.
- Fixed other issues that we found from customer reviews and inquiries.

[Polaris Office 2019 major changed function]
- Old files in the Inbox are moved to the Inbox_old folder.
- When saving a document in Inbox, it is synchronized with iTunes for using more conveniently.

In this version,
- Fixed the issue that a document from external app (Safari, File) is not opened.
- Fixed the issue that a document is not showing when connecting to WebDav.
- Added encoding for texts not to be broken when connecting to FTP.
- Improved the movement that a Sheet document goes to the last worked location when saving and reopening the document.
- Improved Image file insert movement. (Able to insert directly after taking a picture.)
- Added new templates for Polaris slide.
- Fixed other issues that we found from customer reviews and inquiries.

[Polaris Office 2019 major changed function]
- The documents which were saved in [Inbox] folder before are moved to [Inbox_old] folder.
- When saving a document in [Inbox] folder, it is synced with iTunes, so you can use it more conveniently.

In this version,
- Support a document which is protected by Write only password.
- Improved the understanding of WebDAV file.
- Fixed other issues that we found from customer reviews and inquiries.

Polaris Office regards customers feedback as important!
Please give us your opinion for us to provide you better service.
